header.classes: w-full items-center justify-between backdrop-blur-md bg-white/25 border-b border-white/20 transition-all duration-300
header.scroll_effect: backdrop-blur-lg bg-white/35 border-b border-white/30 shadow-lg transition-all duration-300
header.fixed_classes: fixed top-0 left-0 right-0 z-50 transition-all duration-300

footer.classes: w-full items-center backdrop-blur-md bg-white/25 border-t border-white/20 transition-all duration-300
footer.scroll_effect: backdrop-blur-lg bg-white/35 border-t border-white/30 shadow-xl transition-all duration-300
footer.fixed_classes: fixed bottom-0 left-0 right-0 z-40 transition-all duration-300

chat.message_bubble_classes: rounded-2xl p-5 max-w-4xl animate-fade-in transition-all duration-300
chat.user_message_classes: ml-auto bg-gradient-to-br from-primary to-secondary text-white border-none backdrop-blur-sm
chat.assistant_message_classes: bg-white/35 border border-white/20 shadow-soft backdrop-blur-sm transition-all duration-300 hover:bg-white/45
chat.input_container_classes: bg-white/25 rounded-2xl p-4 border border-white/20 transition-all duration-300 focus-within:border-white/40 focus-within:shadow-input focus-within:bg-white/35 backdrop-blur-md

animations.glass_transition: transition: backdrop-filter 0.3s ease, opacity 0.3s ease, background-color 0.3s ease
animations.focus_glass: transition: backdrop-filter 0.3s ease, border-color 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease
